nodes.text: A Venator-class Star Destroyer served as the flagship of High Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi and Clone marshal commander CC-2224 during the Clone Wars, after the destruction of his previous flagship, the Negotiator.

Obi-Wan Kenobi, Commander Cody and the remnants of his men were rescued by the Republic rescue team, following their near-fatal defeat at Grievous' hands; The Star Destroyer became General Kenobi's new flagship after the loss of the Negotiator. Later, Ohnaka transported Ahsoka Tano and six Jedi Younglings to the Star Destroyer. By the late Outer Rim Sieges, Kenobi transferred his command to the Vigilance, a Star Destroyer which became his new flagship. This ship fought at the Battle of Utapau, where it transported Cody and a portion of the 7th Sky Corps to aid Kenobi during his attempt to defeat General Grievous.
